alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jefferson County through 415 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Bluff, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... White Hall... Altheimer... Warbritton... Cottondale... Madding... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Sulphur Springs... Pastoria... Faith... Pinebergen... Ladd... Glenlake... Watson Chapel... Rob Roy... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
